description:
Production on the first season of "Constantine" will end after its initial 13-episode order, but the comic book adaptation could still have a future, NBC confirms to Zap2it. The series will continue to air in its Friday night time slot until the end of the season, with a second season renewal still a distinct possibility. Deadline was first to report the news. 《康斯坦丁》第一季的制作到13集就被叫停，不过NBC向Zap2It透露，这部剧的第二季还是有争取的希望。最先曝出此消息的Deadline网站报道，这部剧已经拍摄的剧集将会继续播出，第二季的续订也不是完全没有可能。

Fans -- appropriately dubbed "Hellblazers" after "Constantine's" comic book source material -- immediately mobilized on Twitter using the hashtag #SaveConstantine to let the world know they won't give up on the show without a fight.而这部根据漫画改编的超级英雄题材美剧的观众们在的打这个消息后，立马在Twitter上发起了#拯救康斯坦丁#的话题，来让全世界知道他们不会轻易放弃。

While Season 1 now won't see the introduction of each of those characters from John's past, the creative team has a good start on a possible Season 2. It now seems like "Constantine" is being set to follow in "Hannibal's" 13-episodes-a-season path.目前第一季的剧情并没有介绍John过去生活的角色出现，大家相信这支颇有创意的团队在有可能存在的第二季会有一个好表现。看来现在《康斯坦丁》要和《汉尼拔》一样只有13集了。

"Constantine" airs Fridays at 10 p.m. ET/PT on NBC.

title: 新剧《康斯坦丁》拍到13集被叫停
